title: October Orane Initiative
description: The October Orange Initiative (OOI) is a nonprofit organization focused on creating positive change in communities.

title: Uppist
description: Uppist is a software engineering company in that develops custom and proprietary software, mobile and web applications for businesses.

title: Luround
description: Luround is an all-in-one client management app for businesses and individuals offering coaching, consulting and training services.

title: SASL
description: SquaredLAB Advisory Services Limited (“SASL”) unlocks peak performance for startups, SMEs, and established companies

title: Advice Generator
description: An online application that uses the Advice Slip API to provide motivational, random quotes.

title: Time Tracking Dashboard
description: Creating a time-tracking dashboard with daily, weekly, and monthly views would enable users to better manage and monitor their time.

title: Age Calculator
description: The purpose of the application is to give users an easy-to-use method for calculating age in years, months, and days.

title: Frequently Asked Questions
description: The FAQ page is a tool created to offer concise, understandable responses to frequently asked questions. By reducing the need for direct customer service and making sure that important information is readily available.

title: Rating Design
description: The Rating Design Component is a reusable and visually appealing UI element designed to allow users to provide feedback by selecting a rating, typically on a numerical or star-based scale

title: To Do App
description: TodoApp is a web application that helps users increase productivity by tracking their daily tasks. With a focus on utility and ease of use, the software lets users add, modify, remove, and mark activities as done.
